alert.note: Alert for Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 10:10AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wayne, southern Oakland and northeastern Washtenaw Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1010 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salem, or near Novi, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Canton around 1020 AM EDT. Livonia around 1025 AM EDT. Romulus around 1030 AM EDT. Taylor and Greenfield Village around 1035 AM EDT. Detroit and Dearborn around 1040 AM EDT. Downtown Detroit and Wyandotte around 1045 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Melvindale, Harper Woods, Westland, Ecorse, Grosse Pointe Woods, Lincoln Park, Southgate, Inkster, Highland Park and Redford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
